references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 120.
links: G. Nebe and N. J. A. Sloane, Home page for this lattice
formula: Apparently, a(n) = sum(d|n, d^2*(4*(kronecker(-4,n/d)-kronecker(-4,d)))), n>0. - _Ralf Stephan_, Dec 31 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
